content: Assign users to roles to begin filling out form

comment.text: The translation key "BadgeDraftTitle" is used to display a title that explains when users can begin filling out a form. It appears in a file status display and indicates when a form is in draft state. Translators should focus on conveying the concept of user assignment to roles for the purpose of initiating form completion.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Formanı doldurmağa başlamaq üçün' is slightly awkward. While grammatically correct, it could be more naturally phrased.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Forma doldurmağa başlayın ki, istifadəçiləri rollara təyin edin

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'təyin edin' is a valid translation for 'assign', in this context, 'göydərin' or 'verin' might be more natural. 'Təyin etmək' often implies a more formal or official assignment.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Formanı doldurmağa başlamaq üçün istifadəçiləri rollara göydərin/verin

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Възложи на потребителите по роли да започнат попълване на формуляра" is a literal translation that doesn't convey the intended meaning effectively.  'Assign users to roles' implies granting them permissions or responsibilities. The Bulgarian translation implies assigning them *based on* roles, rather than assigning them *with* roles.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Предостави на потребителите роли, за да започнат попълване на формуляра

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "да започнат попълване на формуляра" is a bit verbose.  A more concise wording would improve readability.
The translation "Määrää käyttäjiä rooleihin, jotta he pääsevät täyttämään lomakkeen" is a bit literal. A more natural phrasing would convey the intention better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Anna käyttäjille rooleja, jotta he voivat täyttää lomakkeen

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ձևը լրացնելու սկսելու համար" (to begin filling out the form) is a bit clunky. It's literally 'for starting to fill out the form'. A more natural phrasing would be 'ձևի լրացման համար' (for form completion) or 'ձևը լցնելու համար' (to fill out the form).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Նշանակեք օգտատերերին դերեր՝ ձևի լրացման համար

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'フォームを入力するためにユーザーを役割に割り当てます' (Fōmu o nyūkan suru tame ni yūzā o yakuwari ni wariate masu) is a literal translation but doesn't convey the intended meaning as smoothly. It emphasizes *why* users are assigned roles, which isn't the main point. The instruction is to assign users, not to specify the purpose.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ユーザーを役割に割り当てて、フォームへの入力に進んでください (Yūzā o yakuwari ni wariate te, fōmu e no nyūkan ni shingonte kudasai)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'to begin filling out form' is not the most natural translation of 'to begin filling out form'. A more idiomatic Lao translation would be something like 'ເພື່ອເລີ່ມຕື່ມແບບຟອມ' or 'ເພື່ອກໍານົດການຕື່ມແບບຟອມ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ມອບໝາຍຜູ້ໃຊ້ໃຫ້ກັບບົດບາດ ເພື່ອເລີ່ມຕື່ມແບບຟອມ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Atribuiți roluri către utilizatorii pentru a începe completarea formularului" is a bit literal and could be improved for natural Romanian flow. "Atribuiți utilizatorilor roluri..." or "Alocați roluri utilizatorilor..." would be more idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Alocați roluri utilizatorilor pentru a începe completarea formularului

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'පෝරමය පිරවීම ආරම්භ කිරීම සඳහා පරිශීලකයන් භූමිකාවන්ට පවරන්න' is a literal translation but lacks the nuance of 'Assign users to roles to begin filling out form'. It reads a bit awkwardly. A better translation would focus on the action of assigning roles to enable form completion.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පෝරමය පුරවා ගැනීමට පරිශීලකයන් නිශ්චිත භූමිකාවලට පත් කරන්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පරිශීලකයන්' (parashīlakayan) is used for 'users'. While technically correct, 'භාවිතකරුවන්' (bhavitakaruwan) might be a more common and natural word for 'users' in this context.

The translation 'Доделите кориснике у улоге да почну да попуњавају образац' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Assign users to roles to begin filling out form'. A more natural translation would emphasize the action of assigning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Доделите кориснике улози да бисте почели са попуњавањем обрасца

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'у улоге' (in roles) could be improved. Serbian typically uses a more direct word order.
The translation 'Dodelite korisnike u uloge da počnu da popunjavaju obrazac' is overly literal and slightly awkward. A more natural translation would convey the intended meaning more smoothly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dodijelite korisnike uloge kako biste počeli sa popunjavanjem obrasca
